name: FIEND CULTIST
size_type_alignment: Medium or Small Humanoid, Neutral Evil
senses: Darkvision 90 ft. (unimpeded by magical Darkness); Passive

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The cultist makes three Pact Axe attacks.

actions.name: Pact Axe
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) Slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) Fire damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text: The cultist casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks): At Will:

reactions.name: Hellish Rebuke
reactions.text: The cultist casts Hellish Rebuke in response to that spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.
